      public List<InternshipOpportunity> findVisibleByMajorAndLevel(String major, InternshipLevel level)
      Description copied from interface: InternshipOpportunityRepository

      Specified by:
      findVisibleByMajorAndLevel in interface InternshipOpportunityRepository
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      List of matching visible internships
